Description:
Responsible for creating technical drawings and specifications for their product designs, including dimensions, tolerances, and material specifications.
Collaborates with cross-functional teams, including engineering, marketing, and manufacturing, to align product designs with technical, marketing, and manufacturing specifications.
Generates precise technical drawings and specifications for product designs, covering dimensions, tolerances, and material specifications.
Works in synergy with engineering, marketing, and manufacturing teams to guarantee product designs fulfill technical, marketing, and manufacturing prerequisites.Skills
Skills:
Should possess excellent communication skills to effectively present their design concepts and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Demonstrates robust creative thinking abilities to conceive inventive and functional product designs.
Exhibits strong creative thinking skills to generate innovative and practical product designs.
Possesses excellent skills in sketching and prototyping to effectively visualize product design concepts.
